attributes.additional_details: Resolution 1/XI of the Parliament of Catalonia, on the start of the political process in Catalonia as a consequence of the electoral results of 27 September 2015: http://www.cataloniavotes.eu/resolution-1xi-of-the-parliament-of-catalonia-on-the-start-of-the-political-process-in-catalonia-as-a-consequence-of-the-electoral-results-of-27-september-2015/
attributes.background:
On September 27th Catalonia held a historic election and pro-independence parties obtained 72 of 135 seats and 48% of votes, while unionist parties obtained just 39% of votes.
We ask you to recognize this decision and the current political process towards the creation of a Catalan republic.
